entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries late this evening and overnight with risk of freezing rain. Fog patches developing late this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 3. Wind chill near minus 7. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries or rain showers. High plus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries changing to 30 percent chance of rain showers or flurries near noon. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 4. Wind chill minus 6 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of snow or rain. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of rain showers or flurries early in the evening. Periods of snow beginning in the evening. Local snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Friday 31 March 2023
